member.name: IMFSourceBuffer.Abort
member.summary: Aborts the processing of the current media segment.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.summary: Appends the specified media segment to the .
member.param: The length of the media data stored in pData.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.summary: Appends the media segment from the specified byte stream to the .

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSourceBuffer.Remove

The end of the time range.
